EmailTemplate.description: SDK or SDK2 developer free support hours are completed.
EmailTemplate.name: Free support hours over
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your <No. of hours> hours of free Invixium developer support for <SDK Name> have been utilized. Further developer support hours may be purchased through your sales rep at a cost of $<amount>/hr.
General queries are always welcome through support@invixium.com or +1 844 INVIXIUM (468 4948) or invixium_support Skype ID.
Enjoy the experience!
{!Case.Thread_Id}
